news.headline: Eaton Earns First Gold Medal Rating from EcoVadis for Sustainability Performance
news.summary: DUBLIN, April 22, 2024--Intelligent power management company Eaton has achieved a gold medal from EcoVadis, the world’s largest provider of business sustainability ratings. The EcoVadis assessment evaluates 21 sustainability criteria in four key areas including environment, labor and human rights, ethics and sustainable procurement.

news.headline: Eaton declares quarterly dividend payable May 24, 2024
news.summary: DUBLIN, April 23, 2024--The Board of Directors of intelligent power management company Eaton (NYSE:ETN) today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.94 per ordinary share. The dividend is payable May 24, 2024, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 6, 2024. Eaton has paid dividends on its shares every year since 1923.
